reviewText: This is a great DVD celebrating the Queen of Metals Career,excellent Live concert,outstanding Guest stars and performances and Warlock reunites live on stage with Doro. This is an outstanding DVD.
This was bought as a gift.  Unfortunately,  it was unwatchable.  No matter what dvd player was used, it kept saying wrong region.
My dvd arrived promptly the disks looked clean and neither one will play on my new blue ray. I am very disappointed. I tried to send complaint but got no response

I haven't seen the dvd but i'm sure it is awesome as is all of Doro's stuff is. My complaint is its listed as NTSC and is NOT. It is PAL, it will NOT play on US players.  They need to correct this listing.  I bought one of these copies and had to send it back because it wouldn't play.

On the product description it says NTSC,but it IS in PAL format. I think that's VERY poor product description. I couldn't be more disappointed when I got this & it was PAL format. Reading the contents though,I'd give it a 5,hopefully I can find this SOMEWHERE ELSE on NTSC.Thanks for nothing amazon!!
